amendment.description: To make available $2,000,000 for a program to commemorate the 75th anniversary of World War II.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3731 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3731 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5900; text: CR S5900) To make available $2,000,000 for a program to commemorate the 75th anniversary of World War II.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3731 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3731 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
